thread.title: Absolutely amazing Amba Hotel Charing Cross London
thread.title_full: Absolutely amazing Amba Hotel Charing Cross London - Review of Amba Hotel Charing Cross, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: victorias369
title: Absolutely amazing Amba Hotel Charing Cross London
text: The Amba Hotel Charing Cross London is a fantastically friendly great value hotel with a stunning view of Trafalgar Square and the Strand. The staff are really friendly and the coffee shop/bar is really comfortable. They are very generous with crisps, nuts and beautiful biscuits which they will provide with your drink. Lovely old building attached to CharingCross Station - this is also a great place to meet clients and business colleagues or for a drink beforrr going out to the theatre ... thoroughly recommend it, we have been going there since the seventies and it gets better and better
